video.title: Copper
video.synopsis: Set in 1860s New York City, this gripping crime series centers on rugged Irish cop Kevin Corcoran, who works the notorious Five Points neighborhood.

episodes.synopsis: As New York City is still recovering from the Draft Riots of 1863, Corcoran finds himself investigating the murder of a young Five Points girl.
episodes.title: Surviving Death

episodes.synopsis: When a figure from Corcoran's past returns, he finds that nothing is as it seems when it comes to his daughter's death and his wife's disappearance.
episodes.title: Husbands and Fathers

episodes.synopsis: When an Irishman is discovered lynched, racial tension in Five Points builds. As the public cries for a hanging, Corcoran begins to question evidence.
episodes.title: In the Hands of an Angry God

episodes.synopsis: During a murder investigation, Corcoran finds new clues about his daughter's death and the disappearance of his wife.
episodes.title: The Empty Locket

episodes.synopsis: When a gang scheme to rob the wealthy is uncovered, Corcoran must ensure security at an upscale fundraiser.
episodes.title: La Tempete

episodes.synopsis: Corcoran and O'Brien are assigned to a double murder. As they weigh evidence, it becomes apparent that it's a surprising case of revenge gone wrong.
episodes.title: Arsenic and Old Cake

episodes.synopsis: The arrival of a group of high society out-of-towners offers Robert Morehouse a unique business opportunity.
episodes.title: The Hudson River School

episodes.synopsis: On Election Day in New York City, friendships are tested when Maguire takes the law into his own hands and Corcoran must make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Better Times Are Coming

episodes.synopsis: On Thanksgiving, Corcoran finds himself in an ungracious state, with the fallout of recent murders and a shocking discovery shaking his foundation.
episodes.title: A Day to Give Thanks

episodes.synopsis: Corcoran races to keep his life and the city intact when he joins forces with Morehouse, Eva and the coppers of the Sixth Precinct for a huge fight.
episodes.title: A Vast and Fiendish Plot

episodes.synopsis: February 5, 1865: Five Points remains a bedlam. Young men are dying and disappearing at an alarming rate. Meanwhile, Dr. Freeman visits his mentor.
episodes.title: Home, Sweet Home

episodes.synopsis: As more corpses of young men are found and others continue to disappear, Corcoran leaves no stone unturned in his search for answers.
episodes.title: Aileen Aroon

episodes.synopsis: Corcoran closes in on the parties responsible for the kidnapping and murder of young Five Points men.
episodes.title: The Children of the Battlefield

episodes.synopsis: The Sixth Precinct's search for the killer of a fellow officer is derailed as Annie Reilly creates a rift in the Corcoran home.
episodes.title: I Defy Thee to Forget

episodes.synopsis: Five Points falls into a state of panic as a community safe haven is seized by one of the deadliest men in New York City.
episodes.title: A Morning Song

episodes.synopsis: A murder demands Detective Kevin Corcoran work closely with an unlikely partner as Gen. Brendan Donovan is eager to close the case cleanly.
episodes.title: To One Shortly to Die

episodes.synopsis: In his investigation, Detective Kevin Corcoran finds himself at an unusual dead end, while Dr. Freeman faces the outbreak of a troubling new illness.
episodes.title: The Hope Too Bright to Last

episodes.synopsis: The Copper family -- Uptown and Five Points alike -- gather around Detective Kevin Corcoran, who is reeling from a shocking loss.
episodes.title: Ashes Denote That Fire Was

episodes.synopsis: Returning to the precinct, Detective Kevin Corcoran is staggered when he discovers a new investigation has one who is close to him in chains.
episodes.title: Think Gently of the Erring

episodes.synopsis: Detective Kevin Corcoran questions Gen. Brendan Donovan's stronghold in the Five Points community, and solicits Sixth Ward coppers to find the truth
episodes.title: The Fine Ould Irish Gintleman

episodes.synopsis: Looming devastation to Five Points forces Detective Kevin Corcoran to take drastic, irrevocable action against Tammany Hall.
episodes.title: Good Heart and Willing Hand

episodes.synopsis: The assassination of President Abraham Lincoln shatters any hope of a smooth postwar recovery for the people of New York City and the U.S.
episodes.title: Beautiful Dreamer

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of President Lincoln's assassination, Corcoran, Robert Morehouse and Dr. Freeman decide to join a national effort to hunt down the killer.
episodes.title: The Place I Called My Home
